content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Good morning, Mary Smith. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the current rental price?

I am a student, dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am negotiable but I want to keep the price low.

I am willing to discuss the rental price with you. Do you have any other questions about the apartment?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
The current rental price for the apartment is negotiable. As a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains, but I am also looking for a responsible and reliable tenant. Based on your qualifications, I am willing to discuss the rental price with you and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

In addition to the rental price, do you have any other questions or concerns about the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you for your time.

I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mary Smith. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I understand your desire to keep the rental price low. Based on our discussion, I agree to the rental price of x Euro.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before signing the lease agreement. Once you confirm your decision, I will terminate this negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
